headline: Aon names Anne Corona as CEO of Enterprise Clients and Global Chief Commercial Officer
summary: DUBLIN, Dec. 2, 2024 /CNW/ -- Aon plc , a leading global professional services firm, today announces the appointment of Anne Corona as CEO of Enterprise Clients and global chief commercial officer,...

headline: Aon Client Treaty Renews with Record-Setting Support for 2025
summary: Aon plc (NYSE: AON), a leading global professional services firm, today announced the successful renewal and expansion of the Aon Client Treaty (ACT). ACT is the firm's signature London Market placement facility that helps clients respond to complexity with new sources of capital.
